description: There are a number of cases when the import is in the wrong section
title: 'Import contextlib' should be in the section with standard python libraries

comments.content: this bug has not been touched in a long time and it's patch(es) are abandoned.  Please set back to in progress if you start working on it
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~tjones-i

comments.content: I manually checked the modules which import 'contextlib' based on commit c5b4188 (https://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/nova/tree/?id=c5b418893e7edfe326d768c6867af56aa01bfb2d). Each module has the import in the correct section. This bug cannot longer be fixed. What's the correct status for that?

comments.content: Looks like this was fixed by a number of patches that were not tagged with the bug number. I think we should set it to Fix Released in Juno-2.
